info.name: RingCentral REST API
info.description:
This is a collection of API requests associated with the Basic usage plan in RingCentral Connect Platform for Sandbox Testing.

Please use a Postman environment with the following variables: RC_SERVER_HOSTNAME, RC_APP_KEY, RC_APP_SECRET, RC_USERNAME, RC_EXTENSION, RC_PASSWORD

To use these resources, you must ALWAYS start by executing one of the OAuth "Auth" Requests first, then you can use any other requests (for the 60 minutes that the access_token you obtained is valid).

item.name: Auth
item.description: YOU MUST UPDATE VALUES IN THE "Pre-request Script" section of ALL items in this folder to match your RingCentral Sandbox Account.

request.description: Fetch access_token from DevTest environment as Admin

item.name: Adds and/or removes park location users
